Author: dood
Content:
... results for text are good enough. How much better could text search get?

That's pretty much what Google's competition said, before Google came along and took their business.

Author: dood
Content: Fair point, but its nice to see quality video displayed at high-res, and streaming quickly.

Author: dood
Content: Good talk, though I've heard/read most of the points already. Perhaps the vocal and receptive audience made it more entertaining and grounded in reality or something.
